 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָתַם‎</span>] **verb** dubious; **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְתַּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָ֑רֶץ‎</span> [[Isa.9.18|Isa 9:18]] (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***is be clogged in speech***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***suffocating heat***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***burned by heat***; hence [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] ***scorched***, but derived sense dubious; see [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>JPhil. xiii. 61 f.</sup>); — read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצְּתָה‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצַת‎</span>) ***is burned up***, compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>l.c.</sup>, [[BDB#Krochm|Krochm]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup>.
